ch0001_00_kukui/0101_0701_01_10:
Hey, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
Looks like you’re all charged up 
and ready to go, yeah!
ch0001_00_kukui/0101_0701_02_10:
All right! It’s time to enjoy another day full of
exciting battles!
ch0001_00_kukui/0601_0701_01_10:
Rowlet, Litten, and Popplio.
Do you know those Pokémon?
ch0001_00_kukui/0601_0701_02_10:
Those three are the Pokémon that new Trainers
in the Alola region can choose from to be their
first partner Pokémon.
ch0001_00_kukui/0601_0701_03_10:
They’re really energetic Pokémon, yeah! Each is
an important partner for an island challenge!
ch0001_00_kukui/0601_0701_04_10:
Ah! An island challenge is the Pokémon
adventure that kids in the Alola region go on.
ch0001_00_kukui/0601_0701_05_10:
If you’re interested, try asking a Trainer from
the Alola region!
ch0001_00_kukui/0601_0702_01_10:
The day one becomes a Trainer is a precious
memory! It’s something you can never forget!
ch0001_00_kukui/0601_0702_02_10:
You’re making lots of memories together with
your partner, too!
ch0001_00_kukui/0602_0701_01_10:
I let myself get hit with all kinds of moves so I
can test their power!
ch0001_00_kukui/0602_0701_02_10:
People who don’t know what I do probably think
it’s pretty dangerous!
ch0001_00_kukui/0602_0701_03_10:
But my body’s pretty tough, so I’m all right,
even if I get knocked around a little!
ch0001_00_kukui/0602_0701_04_10:
My lab’s all beat up from moves and from me
getting sent flying!
ch0001_00_kukui/0602_0702_01_10:
The Rockruff and Snubbull back at my lab
especially love to play!
ch0001_00_kukui/0602_0702_02_10:
All the important stuff that might get broken
I keep safely in another room anyway, yeah!
ch0001_00_kukui/0603_0701_01_10: My wife, Professor Burnet, is here on Pasio, too!
ch0001_00_kukui/0603_0701_02_10:
Of course I’m enjoying my research, but I’m
also enjoying sight-seeing.
ch0001_00_kukui/0603_0701_03_10: Next, I’d like to see Pasio’s blue oceans!
ch0001_00_kukui/0603_0702_01_10:
Alola’s beaches and Pasio’s beaches 
are totally different, yeah!
ch0001_00_kukui/0603_0702_02_10:
On Alola’s beaches, you can see a lot of
Pyukumuku. But Pasio’s beaches don’t
have them at all!
ch0001_00_kukui/0604_0701_01_10: My Lycanroc is a Midday Form one!
ch0001_00_kukui/0604_0701_02_10:
His Attack and Speed stats are high. 
He’s a partner I can really rely on!
ch0001_00_kukui/0604_0701_03_10:
He’s always looking after the Rockruff back at
the lab!
ch0001_00_kukui/0604_0702_01_10: Rockruff are known to be really friendly!
ch0001_00_kukui/0604_0702_02_10:
When my Lycanroc was a Rockruff, he’d come up
to me for attention, too!
ch0001_00_kukui/0605_0701_01_10:
The Alola region didn’t have a Pokémon League
until I made one, yeah!
ch0001_00_kukui/0605_0701_02_10:
So up until now, the only challengers have been
Trainers from the Alola region.
ch0001_00_kukui/0605_0701_03_10:
But just like other Pokémon Leagues, we’re
always waiting for strong Trainers to come and
challenge us!
ch0001_00_kukui/0605_0701_04_10:
[Name:PlayerNickname ]! Make sure
you come challenge the Alola region’s
Pokémon League, OK, cousin?
ch0001_00_kukui/0605_0702_01_10:
The Alola region’s Champion is actually around
the same age as you, yeah!
ch0001_00_kukui/0605_0702_02_10:
I’m sure you’ve got a chance to become a
superstrong Trainer in the Alola region, cousin!
ch0001_00_kukui/1701_0701_01_10:
Oh! Great timing, yeah!
I have something I wanted to give to you!
ch0001_00_kukui/1701_0701_02_10:
How is it? I thought this was something you
could really use!
ch0001_00_kukui/1701_0702_01_10:
When you’re out doing fieldwork, you can
find these kinds of useful items sometimes.
ch0001_00_kukui/1701_0702_02_10:
Whenever I meet different people and Pokémon,
I discover lots of new things!
ch0001_00_kukui/2501_0701_01_10:
Your adventures take you running all over the
place, don’t they? That’s great!
ch0001_00_kukui/2501_0701_02_10:
It takes a lot of energy to do that much exploring
outside, yeah!
ch0001_00_kukui/2501_0701_03_10:
Maybe in the future you’ll become 
a Pokémon Professor, yeah!
ch0001_00_kukui/2501_0702_01_10:
Your future is overflowing 
with possibilities, cousin!
ch0001_00_kukui/2501_0702_02_10:
If you’re passionate about something, keep on
challenging yourself!
ch0001_00_kukui/2501_0702_03_10: I’ll help you out on your way, yeah!
ch0001_00_kukui/2511_0701_01_10:
My dream was to create a Pokémon League in
the Alola region!
ch0001_00_kukui/2511_0701_02_10:
If you keep trying, your dreams can come true.
I’ll never forget that—even now!
ch0001_00_kukui/2511_0701_03_10:
If you’ve got a dream you want to make true,
I’ll support you all the way, yeah!
ch0001_00_kukui/2511_0702_01_10:
The road to making your dream come true is
paved with difficulties! The normal way 
of doing things often isn’t enough.
ch0001_00_kukui/2511_0702_02_10:
That’s why overcoming those difficulties feels
even better!
ch0001_00_kukui/3001_0701_01_10:
Morning! Sleep well, cousin?
I got some good rest, and I’m ready to go, yeah!
ch0001_00_kukui/3002_0701_01_10:
Morning, cousin! Sharing a smile first thing
makes me feel great all day!
ch0001_00_kukui/3003_0701_01_10:
Hey there! Perfect day for some Pokémon battles,
yeah? I wanna do some more move research!
ch0001_00_kukui/3004_0701_01_10:
Hey! You’re heading out now, yeah?
Have fun battling out there!
ch0001_00_kukui/3005_0701_01_10:
Alola! Heading out now, cousin?
It’s dark, but you can go anywhere
with Pokémon by your side!
ch0001_00_kukui/3006_0701_01_10:
Evening! Still ready to go all out, cousin?
Get some rest if you start to feel tired, yeah.
